// Determine if this user can post var status = "initiation"; // User has never attempted to post var userId = gs.getUserID(); var siteManagersGR = new GlideRecord("x_snc_guide_site_managers"); siteManagersGR.addQuery("user", userId); siteManagersGR.query(); if (siteManagersGR.hasNext()) { while (siteManagersGR.next()) { if (siteManagersGR.site) { // If a record exists for this user and a site, that means // the site has been approved, and their management status over the site is also approved. // They can post. status = "registered"; break; // Exit loop now to ensure this is the final status. There may be other sites pending } if (siteManagersGR.registration) { // If there is a user, no approved site, but an open registration, // they are waiting for the site registration approval status = "pending"; } } } status;
